mapper.select:
select pa.serialnumber as chassi , pa.billing_date__c as salesDate , pa.dealercode__c as salesDealerCode , (select corporaterepresentativename__c from process.account where external_id__c = pa.dealercode__c) as salesDealerNick , pa.oper_status_cd__c as salesCode , pa.description__c as saleVersion , pa.fsc__c as salesFSCOCN , pa.enginetype__c as salesMotor , pa.modelname__c as vinModel , pa.vehiclecolor__c as vinColor , pa.legacy_last_upd as updated , pa.x_del_home__c as delHome , pa.x_dig_sales__c as digitalSales , pa.x_td_home__c as tdHome , pa.x_sales_cancel_dt__c as salesCancelled , pa.external_id__c as assetId from process.asset pa where
pa.legacy_created = to_date(#{dateInput}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
pa.billing_date__c = to_date(#{dateInput}, 'YYYY-MM-DD')
and pa.oper_status_cd__c != 'ZV02'
and pa.oper_status_cd__c = 'ZV02'
and pa.serialnumber = #{vin}

select pa.row_id as idSiebel , ac.relation_type_cd as relatedType , ac.status_cd as relatedStatus , pa.calloptyn__pc as suppressAllCalls , pa.emailoptyn__pc as suppressAllEmails , pa.directmailoptyn__pc as suppressAllMailings , pa.blockedmobile__c as suppressAllMobilePhone , pa.blockedsms__c as suppressAllSMS , pa.x_printed_card__c as suppressAllVideoCall , pa.blockedwhatsapp__c as suppressAllWhatsapp from process.account pa join process.asset_con ac on pa.external_id__c = ac.contact_id where ac.asset_id = #{assetGetRowId}

select pa.row_id as idSiebel , aa.rel_type_cd as relatedType , aa.status_cd as relatedStatus from process.account pa join process.asset_accnt aa on pa.external_id__c = aa.accnt_id where aa.asset_id = #{assetGetRowId}
